name: SnowReportforAppalachianSki
0:
”Alexa, open Appalachian Ski”
”Alexa, ask Appalachian Ski for the snow report”
”Alexa, ask Appalachian Ski for latest conditions”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: appalachian ski
des: The Appalachian Ski Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions, base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
